page.title: 01THE CITY OF CARLISLE
page.content: This block contains the Northwestern quarter,or more,of the city.One corner takes in a large share of the city centre including its main historic remains<p.19>but not the main shopping area.The Southern area of the block shows how the city slowly grew through the ages<p.2>.The Northern and Western areas of the block are more modern de- velopments.There is much variety,and these pages include descriptions of rural<p.6>,industrial<p.7>,and suburb- an areas<p.8-18>.Carlisle is a centre of local government,and provides med- ical,leisure and shopping facilities for the region.Writing by J.Dobson,S. Adams,M.Tait,G.Reay,J.Barnes,A.Bell,D. OBrien,S.Percival and J.Robinson<Belle Vue School>.Research S.Little,K.Taylor N.Scholtz,W.Byers,K.Davidson and pict- ures by D.Spires<Trinity School>.
